title: Client keeps telling me I'm putting in incorrect password/username but i'm not
body: So basically the league client keeps telling me i'm putting in the wrong password and username even though I wen't through the trouble of closing it, changing regions and back, closing it and re opening and changing my password. This is really scuffed like why is this client not accepting my details even though they are correct and I literally just changed them?... Can anyone help me out on this? Makes no sense to me.

replies.body:
Hey 	Giørno Giovanna,

Can you try logging in again to see if it's working? It looks like some of the other players who reported this initially successfully logged on by now. If not, can you reach out to the **[Support Site](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)** with your logs so we can take a look at what's going on? The **[Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367)** can grab all the logs in one go.
thx man it Work Son Golin  lm so happy my account back
Glad I'm not the only one with this issue, I assume they will try to fix this asap. I changed my password even and it still wont let me in

Posted this in another thread:
I'm having this issue atm. I tried logging in, and it said my "Username or password is incorrect." After trying multiple times, I panicked that maybe my account was compromised, so I had my password reset. Alas, the "error" is still occurring on the client, but I'm able to login on the website just fine still.
Wish we could just go back to the old client already, this one has too many issues =/
